155331.content:
This is the famous story by Cheesecaker on Furaffinity about Sparks the Pikachu and Cocoa the Raichu.

Hope you enjoy!

The stadium crowd was abuzz with chatter and bustle of anticipation as the start of the Pokemon league charity, friendly match approached. The trainers started to walk to the field of Pokemon battle. Terrence, 17 year old Pokemon trainer from Saffron city was Hyped and ready for his upcoming match along with his trusty first choice Pokemon Sparks, a Pikachu. Sparks had been through a lot with his trainer, Mastering a skill-set of moves and abilities that could Challenge some of the largest and intimidating kinds of Pokemon, traveling along the lands defeating many gym leaders to gain the prized badges and even competing in the grand Indigou Pokemon league to try and help his trainer claim the title of Pokemon Grand Master. Even though he and his fellow Pokemon colleagues only lasted until the mid stage rounds, he put up one hell of a fight and even defeated some of the most ferocious opponents such as Charizards and Dragonites using his mastery of quick Attacks. So a charity friendly match was no longer the nervous ordeal it once was.


Sparks felt an Adrenaline rush as he waited inside his poke ball in his state of readiness as if he could take on any opponent thrown at him. "Trainers please send out your first Pokemon!"the irritatingly overexcited announcer bellowed over the stadium speakers. Terrence now arrived at his side of the Pokemon battle arena podium looked over to see his opponent was a female about Terrence's own age and sporting a rather hefty figure, Terrence thought she looked a little naive for a serious trainer even if she was dressed in sporty clothes and a cap and maybe she was just pity fodder who the league let in to the big time stadium because of this match being for charity, he thought she looked kinda cute but he was determined to concentrate on the match as he threw out the poke ball containing Sparks (he always used Sparks first and his main choice).

With a snap opening of the poke ball, sparks materialized onto the field ready for action. (Okay bring it on! I feel like i could take on a Gyrados tonight!) thought the Nimble Pikachu. The other trainer looked out upon Sparks with a slight smirk as she reached for her Pokeball. " go Cocoa!" She yelled as she threw her poke ball onto the field and as the glowy outline of her selected Pokemon started to materialize.


Sparks noticed this Pokemon was a larger type from the glowy outline, maybe a Snorlax or Charizard. However when the full materialization had taken Place, he could see in plain sight it was a female Raichu but never before had he seen one this size! Not only of amazingly tall height for a Raichu she was undeniably sporting one big and heavy figure,from her curvy assets to her bottom heavy hips and rear it filled Her comparatively insignificant sized opponent with ambivalence.


( Whoa! She's huge! What does her trainer feed her? Kangasthan Meat? and she sure is a big girl, her hips must extend from here to...no! Snap out of it! A Pokemon's Size and gender has never thrown you off before!) Sparks quickly changed his expression as he tried to reaffirm himself in full professional battlemode. ( She's just fat and lazy, that's all! The bigger they are, the harder they fall! She must barely be even to lift her tail at that size, ill take advantage of my speed as always! After all she's a Raichu, i bet she never even learned quick attack as a Pikachu, probably just had a rushed evolution so she could be a bully like all the other Raichus) Sparks thought with a determined scorn as his past in the wild before his capture by his trainer as he was always bullied by Raichus that took other reason than there own amusement at his fear of them. But After his training and experiences in Pokemon battling , Sparks had learn t tricks and abilities way beyond his size that had taken down many a Raichu in past battles and he loved every minute of showing them that his Strategy and speed and Outmatched them every time

. Sparks had no intention of showing this particular Raichu any mercy. The Intimidating Raichu Cocoa gave Sparks a quick look and gave a cocky smile as she focused in on him. Sparks felt a mixture of anger and apprehension as he noticed her leer. ( Dammit, I hate it when Raichus look at me like that! ill show her not to underestimate me just because I'm a Pikachu!) Sparks thought to himself.

"Sparks! She's just a typical Raichu under all that weight! You know what to do, volt tackle! End this quick!" his trainer yelled. Oddly Cocoa's trainer just gave a slight smile and watched silently as Sparks bolted into action and started to run quickly in a zig zag pattern towards Cocoa, building up speed and electricity for a powerful volt tackle. After a unhindered run up, Sparks dived into the air headed straight for his opponents top half hoping to knock her down with one volt charged strike. Reacting unexpectedly quickly, Cocoa Span round and places her paws on her ample ass in preparation for a counter position, she quickly charges electricity from within and leaps backwards from the ground at amazing propulsion and speed, meeting Sparks midair with thunderous impact with her butt. * SLAM!* only given a second to react to her move, Sparks is catapulted away with twice as much velocity amongst a barrage of electrical energy omitted from Cocoa own Special style of volt tackle.

After being flung sharply across the stadium back to his own end, Sparks hit the ground sharply, ricocheting several times gathering painful impact bruises. Her electrical Charge was at a whole other level to his and although being an electric type it wasn't as Painful as other Pokemon types would endure, it sure stung as hell all over. Combined with the impact damage, trying to gather his thoughts Sparks could barely stand on his paws as he tried to asses what had happened. ( ARgh! that hurt like hell! My ears are ringing...how did she move that fast? I cant find my feet..i can barley see) As his vision returned slowly, currently at a blurry dizzy haze, he heard the distinct sound of " THUD! THUD! THUD!" from Cocoas giant paws resonating slightly from the soft plastic green floor of the arena.

Cocoa was making her way steadily but dreadingly unhurriedly towards him. A chill came over Sparks as his vision could now just about make out her gigantic frame standing over him. For the first time in the battle, Cocoa spoke to the Battered Pikachu who was struggling to make it to his paw, with a Feminine yet powerfully confident voice she stated " Come on Little guy, give it up, I dont want to hurt you anymore. Just run back to your trainer and he'll zap you up inside your poke ball."

Every Bad memory of Raichus who had thrown their weight around and bullied Sparks came bubbling to the surface of his emotions. He hated being told he was little and helpless, the humiliation he was already feeling at his Volt tackle being countered was enough but being told he should give up out sneering pity from a Raichu? Mustering up what little strength he could, Sparks refocused his attention on Cocoa and raised himself proudly on two paws. ( There's no way I'm giving in yet! I'll take her down somehow!) Sparks proclaimed to himself as feelings of steely Resistance filled him as he gave a defiant look towards Cocoa....
155331.title: Cocoa the Raichu by Cheesecaker

1553311.content:
Chapter 2 of the original story by Cheesecaker on Furaffinity :)

http://www.furaffinity.net/user/cheeseca...

Sparks was blinded by a unwavering inner rage at a Raichu Telling him he was little and should give up, it brought back too many bad memories of his past. As if a vague memory of a dream, The stadium, his trainer, the noise of the crowd. All disappeared and replaced by the solid imagery of the beatings and taunting he used to receive from gangs of vicious Raichus that used to beat up and chase him because of his smaller size.

As if all his anger and prejudice against Raichus he felt had been focused into his thoughts and speech, Sparks barked out to Cocoa “ Only I decide when I’m beaten you…you..you Fat freak!”

Spark’s words hit Cocoa like a Ice tipped bullet. Like Sparks, she had been victim to ridicule and bullying by other Pokémon Due to her size in the past. But Not due to her small size, due to her large size. Ever since she was a Pichu she had always been unusually large for her breed and along with her expansive appetite which gave her a ultra-voluptuous figure that only made her stand out more, she was often the target of cruel insults and exclusion by other Pokémon. All those words, those horrible words which triggered all the memories of loneliness and hurt. “ Lard-ass”, “ Fatso”and of course “Freak”, they all amounted to an old wound suddenly reopened by the scorning little Pikachu in front of her. She hated any Judgement or Degradation based on her weight.
For what seemed like a short flash of time Sparks noticed how Cocoas previous expression of confidence had changed into a look of shock as his words sunk in, then Cocoa quickly looked away to the side as her cheeks turned red with a crimson of shame and hurt. Sparks saw what seemed to be a tear welling up in the corner of her eye, barely visible as she turned away.

It dawned on Sparks very quickly what his impulsive verbal attack on Cocoa had done. His body was ready to gear up for another Speed attack but it seemed his frenzied insult had hurt her more than any physical attack could and he stopped . ( oh man, what have I said? I didn’t mean it to come out like that!) Sparks thought with extreme regret. Sparks looked down very quickly towards the ground not wanting to look Cocoa in the eye as he was now feeling very ashamed of what his words had triggered. He slowly moved his face and eyes to face Cocoa and immediately apologize for his misguided tirade. “ I…I didn’t m-“ Before he could barely start his apology, Cocoa was now facing him directly with a very different expression. Her vulnerable visage just a second ago had been replaced with focused eyes and a wide cruel smile. “ So I’m a freak am I? Well im gonna show you what this freak can do!” cutting off any chance Sparks had to explain himself, as her now Slightly deeper and Anger filled voice boomed over him ,Cocoa Raised one her giant paws Over the repentant Pikachu and Brought it down upon him with extreme force. “ WHAM!” Sparks was now pinned to the ground by Cocoas ample paw with ever increasing weight being applied to by Cocoas massive frame.

Sparks in incredible pain, tried in vain to utter out calls of Mercy, apology, help, anything to stop the immense pain and pressure he was being put under by the enraged Raichu, but it was useless, his body was under too much strain so he could barely make out gasps for air.

“Cocoa! Stop it! You’ve won, let him go!” Cocoa’s trainer Yelled from the podium, obviously seeing how far Cocoa was going. Cocoa was blind and deaf to any orders now, Any Pokemon that made fun of her weight was going to pay for it now, It’s the main reason she had become such a formidable battler. Her days of running away and wallowing is in self-pity alone when she was in the wild were over, any emotional pain She felt was going to be paid back double in physical pain to any pokemon who made fun of her figure no matter what kind of Pokémon and right now her sights were set on the Pikachu she now had beneath her right paw.

“ I got a special move that should teach you some manners!” Cocoa yelled at Sparks as she removed her paw and turned around and bent her knees in preparation for a special move she had learnt for taking larger Pokémon off their feet. “Earthquake!” Cocoa yelled as she sprung upwards into the air once again with unimaginable Speed and Propulsion. Sparks was momentarily released from the pressure of her paw crush and was barley catching his breath when he looked up to see Cocoas Giant rear starting to plummet towards him from above. * SLAM! CRASSHH!* with incredible dissension, Cocoas rear slammed down upon him and all but Sparks’s head was smothered by the impact of Cocoas gargantuan body as the force of her Earthquake attack caused the Stadium ground around him to crack and split form the pressure.

The pressure of this devastating move made Sparks feel he had been sat on by a titanic goddess. The sharp Pain and shock caused him to black out. “ Ha! How do you like that!” Cocoa boasted while closing her eyes in a satisfied manner. As she opened them her rage had died down as had the Shattered ground of the stadium and shock wave around her. Her expression changed from smugness to concern as she realized just how much devastation her attack might have caused to the silent and flattened Pikachu. She immediately rose from her position and stood up. “ Hey…are you okay?”…
1553311.title: Chapter 2

15533111.content:
Sparks was slowly opening his eyes to the unfamiliar interior of the Pokémon centre recovery ward. As soon as his thoughts had cleared, he knew exactly the familiar scenario he had now found himself in, he had been defeated by an enemy Pokémon to the point of passing out …After his foggy sight focused in on his surroundings he noticed his trainer Terrence and the Trainer of Cocoa were leaning over him.

Terence with a look of relief, exclaimed “ Sparks old buddy! Glad to see you finally woke up! Your going to be fine champ, Nurse Joy said it was just shock and a few bruises on your body, two more days in the centre Max!”. Mellisa ( Cocoas trainer) Spoke as well. “ Oh im so sorry About what Cocoa did to you Sparks, she’s never disobeyed me like that before, I feel awful about what happened and I can tell Cocoa does too, isn’t that right Cocoa?” Melissa turned to the back of the room and from a short distance away the familiar voice of a female Raichu was heard “ Rai…rai” (Translation: Yes…I do).

That very moment Nurse Joy walked in. “ Ahh as expected your little Pikachu is up about Mr Terrence, as you can see if was mostly just a few bruises and pressure shock that caused him to pass out for so long, a couple of days to let those bruises heal over and he’ll be as spry as a Pidgeot! You should leave him alone to get some further rest and be fed after a short while but first If you’d like to follow me to my office we’ll go over His medication plan, now this Involved the New D-Grade pills that should be taken with meals..” Nurse joy explained. Melissa chimed in “ Oh ive used D Grades before, Ill come with you Terrence, ill help explain anything you don’t get about the poractical stuff. Cocoa, You stay here and Look After Sparks..maybe even Apologise aye? Good girl.” Melissa beamed. “ Okay Sparks will be back soon, take it easy okay?"

Cocoa Continued to look meek and apologetic as she started to take large, slow steps towards the bedded and bandaged Pikachu. * Thwump!Thwump! Thwump!* The familiar soft thuds her Giant paws made reminded Sparks of the sharp feelings of Dread he had experienced just a short time ago in the stadium, as the last time he heard those thuds it meant only that the towering Raichu was about to dish out a devastating attack. However as Cocoa moved in close enough to kneel over the bed slightly ( she was tall enough so that her arms, chest and face were visible above the bed, something most Raichus would not come close to be able to do). Cocoa looked at Sparks with soft, guilty eyes. Her expression brought out gut reactions in Sparks that were completely different from before, intimidation being replaced with intrigue and ambivalence. What was really going on in that Titaness’s mind? (Was she here to make fun of me? Was she forced here by her trainer? Is she genuinely sorry? Please gods don’t tell me she had intentions of harming me….after all she is a Raichu and you cant really trust those brutes!). A great many thoughts passed through Sparks mind at that instant but they all seem to result in just him posing a very neutral dumbfounded look on his face and awkwardly greeting her with “ Uhhh…hi there” ( Well that sounded dumb!) Sparks inner critic thought to himself at the casual utterance. Cocoa Slowly began to speak with an honest tone. “ Look Sparks, I’m really sorry about what I did to you, I just lost control. That move was supposed to be for taking Dragonites off their feet,I wanted you to know im not cruel by nature…I was bullied a lot in the wild growing up because of my size and it…well its no excuse at all but it still can still have an effect on me today when I hear certain words..and I’m really sorry”.

It very quickly sunk into Sparks why his words in the battle had such an effect on her, He was bullied a lot because of Size aswell in the wild..just for the opposite reason, for being small and helpless against packs of Cruel Raichus that used to lay claim to his area. “Cocoa, you have nothing to apologise for, winning a Pokemon match is what your supposed to do, what I said was just pure nasty and…I want you to know I didn’t mean any of it, I said it out of Jealousy..” after hearing her be so honest and open Sparks felt a striking desire to be follow suit “ I was so jealous that I was defeated by you so easily I just lashed out and …I had a bad past with other Raichus, I guess I was just directing my feelings I had for them to you…I was so desperate to try and hurt you physically in battle I resorted to the worst form of damage…verbal damage and I became nothing but an asshole because of it, I deserve everything I got…sorry”.

After hearing Sparks confession Cocoas expression changed slightly more compassionate and upbeat as she told sparks “ Oh don’t be silly hun, it doesn’t matter what you said in the battle, Im a professional fighter and I shouldn’t let mere words cause me to lose control..especially when I know my size is mostly my fault and there were was some truth to what you said..i shouldn’t take my body issues out on an opponent like that.” Cocoas ears and eyes drooped a little in an obvious showing that she was having a moment of self-loathing. As if Sparks was on auto piloted he stridently spoke back “ Don’t say that! You bested me fair and square with your amazing skills and strength and you have a beautiful and powerful body and should not be ashamed of it!” almost instantly after Sparks little speech he felt a sting of hot blood flow to his head as he became awash with embarrassment as his inner reasoning yelled at him.

"Ohh!” She gasped and quickly moved her paw onto Spark’s forehead as she knew the main cause of dark orange sparks spluttering from an electric mouse Pokémon’s cheek was most commonly high fever from a potentially life threatening disease.” You didn’t tell me you had a fever sparks! How bad is it…oh”. After a few seconds of checking his forehead she realised he was perfectly normal temperature. “ No…my temperatures fine” Sparks slowly told Cocoa with a tone of apprehension as the Small bursts of orange sparks came out. Cocoas feelings soon changed from concern to flattered appreciation as she knew there was only one other time Pikachus emitted dark orange cheek sparks, that being a time of intense love and desire. Before she thought Sparks confession of admiration of her looks and body could just be polite apologetic guilt but There was a saying amongst electric type Pokemon “ The Sparks don’t lie”, Taken aback at first at how A Pikachu could ever find a Raichu of her size desirable, Cocoa felt touched by the primal affections of this Little Pikachu, she then giggled a little at how the saying has double meaning as the Pikachus name in question is literally “Sparks” and he certainly was not lying!. “ did I say something funny?” Said Sparks as Cocoa lifted her paw from him. “ No, you didn’t, and I think your obviously far from a fever, although you may be coming down with something else” Cocoa said with a loving smile. “ Huh?”replied Sparks oblivious to what his Spark based reactions were showing Cocoa. “ Im just so glad you understand me and you forgive me...it means a lot to me” As Cocoa explained with a gentle voice to Sparks her gratitude, she leaned in and gave an innocent yet passionate kiss on his cheek as she closed her eyes. Sparks turned a deep red in shock as the feeling of Cocoa kiss on his cheek felt like nothing he had ever experienced before, Could this warm feeling of affection really be coming from a Raichu of all Pokemon? The Breed he had written of as all arrogant jerks? Amongst the thoughts of Surprise swirling in his heated head Sparks knew one thing above all, he was really enjoying this moment.

As in what seemed like a flash, Terrence and Melissa walked in and beheld Cocoas Action on Sparks. “ Whoa!” exclaimed Terrence. “ Cocoa! Bad girl! Leave that poor Pikachu alone!” Yelled Mellissa. Cocoa quickly snapped away from Sparks and Looked slightly embarrassed at hangdog at her master. “heh heh, you don’t need to be angry with Cocoa, I think she was just making a very heartfelt apology, Sparks doesn’t seem to be against it” Terrence said with an almost college jock like approval. “Still...Sometimes little missy here needs to learn not to be so headstrong when im out of her view for a few seconds aye?” Melissa beamed at Cocoa. “ Come on Cocoa, we need to get ready for that Match tonight, say goodbye to Sparks!”. Cocoa turned to Sparks with a warm smile and said “ Thank you for forgiving me Sparks, you really are a special Pikachu”. Sparks now feeling a sudden pang at sadness at the prospect of a goodbye replied “ no, thank you for understanding, its just such a shame we probably wont get to know each other more..” Cocoa continued to smile “ Oh don’t be so sure, fate has a way of bringing pokemon together when they want it bad enough” and with a wink, Cocoa Walks off with Melissa as the human trainers make their farewells. “Goodbye Cocoa"

Speaking of which Terrence walked to wards Spark’s bedside, where Sparks expected him to inform him of the latest training schedules after he was out of the centre. “well I’m glad to see you and Cocoa seem to hit it off, because Mellissa has invited me over for dinner at her place and she said she’d love it if you could come along too out of poke ball on free foot little buddy, she wants to make you a special meal as well to make up for what happened, I take it you’d like that?”. Sparks heart raced at the news. “ Pika!Pika!” The words Terrence heard where filled with such enthusiasm he knew what Sparks wanted in his response. “ OK champ, we’ll be there on Thursday night."
15533111.title: Pokecenter

choices: He finishes it... But gets desert:(
155331111.content:
As Terrence approached the expansive, well maintained entrance to Melissa’s house for the dinner he and Sparks had been invited too, which turned out to be more of a farmhouse ranch, he released Sparks from his Pokeball. “ Now Sparks, on your best behaviour Okay, I get the feeling you want Cocoa and Melisa to think you’re a well behaved Pikachu!”. Terrence explained. “ Pika!” Sparks replied enthusiastically. the heart of the little Pikachu was beating faster than usual at the anticipation of being at Cocoas home and meet her again. He knew in his heart that the idea of a Pikachu and a Raichu becoming mates was a mere fantasy but that didn’t help in how he thought of her. He just hoped their friendship wouldn’t be ruined by him saying or doing something stupid. He just hoped to the heavens that they got along and she still liked him.

Terrence rang the doorbell and it was promptly opened by Melissa who welcomed him in with a hug . “ Come on in guys, I can tell Cocoa Cocoa has been excited to see you Sparks, I think she has a soft spot for you!” Melissa addressed to Sparks. he blushed a little at this as he slowly plodded into the entrance and was immiedtaley awestruck by how large and lavish this house was, upon thoughts of his impressions on the outside, it would seem this was more of a ranch or a farm or something considering the expansive land the house was built around. “ Wow, this place is pretty swish, You actually own this?” Terrence asked. “ I do now, this whole place with its grounds is actually a Taraus farm and a Pokémon specialist care ranch for injured or troubled Pokémon that need special help with training. It used to belong to my Aunt but she taught me everything she knew and moved away abroad, She asked me if I wanted to take Up the place and I was more than ready for the challenge, so I guess you could call me the administrator of this place.” Mellissa explained back to Terrence.

As Pikachu glanced around at the expansive living room area the entrance hall lead into he noticed lots of Pokémon exercise apparatus and toys. It seemed like a house designed more for Pokémon than it was people. Then the striking sight of Cocoa standing by the couch hit his vision dead on. She looked just as bold and bountiful as ever with her huge frame but the her warm greeting smile and wagging tail gave off a new aura of Pleasant vehemence about her. “Welcome Sparks, I’m so glad you came!” Cocoa said with a smile. “ Oh my pleasure, believe me, your trainers house is beautiful!!” Sparks beamed with a slight blush; he couldn’t help feel even more nervous the more Cocoa showed compassion and excitement towards him. “Your Pokémon must love it here hen” Said Terrence. “ Oh yeah I try and keep them out of there Pokeballs as much as possible, Cocoa here is never in hers except for transport, she’s not just my champion and pet, she’s my friend as well, isn’t that right my little princess?” Melissa said in a baby talk kind of way as she walked over to Cocoa and stroked her Ears and face all over with sentimental fondness. “Chuu..chuu” Cocoa purred out as she closed her eyes to indulge in her trainers affections. ( little princess huh? More like Conquering Empress!) Sparks thought ti himself with a giggle as he saw how surreal it looked to see Cocoa be so docile like a pampered meowth. ( he found it Difficult to believe this fearsomely large pokemon with such devastating attacks could be treated like a giant cuddly teddy bear.)

“Ok Cocoa, Sparks, into the Kitchen, I made a special dinner for you guys, Terrence take a seat in the dining room, ours will be ready soon!” announced Melissa. Cocoa and Sparks made their way on all fours into the Kitchen, Sparks was ripe with anticipation to see what had been made, by the way Mellisa was talking, it seemed unlikely it was just gonna be regular Pokémon canned food. The Kitchen that Sparks was presented with looked like it was installed yesterday, everything was clean and gleaming and the floor was made of black and white tiles with a clear and disorientating reflection. Coming from the upper surfaces of the kitchen was the enticing aroma of cooked meat.

As they both stopped on two paws to wait for Mellisa to get them the food, Cocoa turned to Sparks and asked “ So Sparks you ever had human food before?” , “ not really. A few snacks here and there” Sparks replied. “ Oh you’re in for a treat here then!” Cocoa beamed.

“Ok Guys, I made double loaded Burgers for you guys, These are the size I usually make for Cocoa Sparks so just eat what you can OK?” Melissa said and she placed the huge burgers down on the floor on surprisingly high class looking silver plates. Melissa then walked back to the other side of the kitchen to finish her and Terrence’s meal and left Cocoa and Sparks to their meal.

The Huge burger, bursting with fillings and grilled meat before Sparks caused the Pikachu to gulp in amazement at its size. Cocoa licked her lips and greedily started taking huge bites of her burger as she lifted it to her waiting maw with her paws. Bit by bit her burger started to disappear. Sparks looked on at amazement at the huge female Raichu before him, guzzling down huge chompfulls of the burger that was in her paws. ( Damn, I can see where she got that body from, Shes amazing!) A lot of Pokemon may be averse to the ravenous appetite Cocoa had, but for Sparks it was just one more free spirited aspect of her that made him appreciate her. Cocoa momentarily stopped to look down at the little Pikachu still looking bedazlled at her Gluttony and the size of his own burger. “ You gonna start there little guy? Don’t worry if you cant eat it all, Id be more than willing to finish anything you cant handle”. Cocoa told Sparks with a hint of making fun of his limited stomach size. Sparks’s competitive proud side came out at this and he gave a confident smile back with sharpened eyes. “ Oh don’t worry! I won’t let a burger defeat me!” Sparks retorted with cockiness as he started to take bites from the side of the burger, trying to catch up to Cocoas speed a little. ( mmm Man this is good, so many flavours, this is SO much better than human food!) Sparks continued to munch away, the heavily packed meat of the burger and the gooey thick cheese were starting to take their toll on the poor little Pikachy as his belly started to stretch outwards into a tightly packed ball shape. When Squeaks was barely even half way done he had to take a rest as the mouthfuls of high fat burger meat and all the trimmings with it were causing an overload of sensations he’d never felt before. As he sat down to take a rest he noticed Cocoa was just finishing her last bite of her burger and she finished it off with a satisfied gulp.” *Beeellcch!* “ Finished! Man, I love Melissa loaded burgers, you having trouble there spark?” said Cocoa. Sparks felt so belittled by how she made it look so easy, if he were to give up now less than half way done, he thought he’d look like some kind of fragile culinary wimp! He had to at least try to finish it. “ ugh..no way! Just pacing myself, I can finish this no problem!” Sparks tried to proclaim proudly. Cocoa Placed her Empty plate down beside her and grinned calmly back at Sparks, she found it amusing how his stubborn competitiveness was stopping him from admitting defeat.
155331111.title: Round for Dinner

choices: Cocoa has somethings else in mind ;)
1553311112.content:
Sparks starting to look very overwhelmed by the half eaten burger. He defiantly got off from his sitting position and onto to his two back paws to prove he was not going to be defeated by its Calorie filled power. Cocoa raised one eyebrow as she looked to Sparks with relaxed intrigue. “ So, you really think you can finish this meal?” Asked Cocoa with toying provocation. “Oh I can and will!” Sparks said with a determined smile. “ Well that sounds like you accept my challenge! Finish the meal and lets say it counts as you beating me in a Pokemon match m’kay?” Cocoa declared. “You’re on!” Sparks met her Challenge with great enthusiasm, he may have many different feelings in him with regards to this Ravenous Raichu before him, but above all he was a battling Pokemon, and a challenge was a challenge! How could he refuse a chance to beat this formidable opponent if all he had to do was finish half of a hamburger?

Sparks began taking more bites one after the other to gradually ware down the mass of Meat before him, By now his stomach was starting to make unsettled churning noises. Cocoa just looked on in amusement, as if she knew the result of a game before it had even started. Sparks was determined to eat this damn burger, it was only about a quarter left now. He felt he was taking his stomachs endurance to its absolute edge but It would be worth it just to show Cocoa he could do it. (Maybe if I can show I can eat as much as she does, she’ll have some sort of new respect for me!). Sparks thought to himself to give him an extra incentive to manage the gargantuan burger. As Sparks finished of the last morsel of the Burger, he lay flat on his back and panted heavily as if he’d just finished a marathon. “ *Pant, pant*…There…I finished the whole thing…not bad for a Pikachu huh?” Sparks said in a strained, exhausted voice whilst smiling triumphantly at what he thought was a pretty impresessive feet of appetite considering his size, the burger looked like it was almost as big as him! “Sure is Sparks! You’re halfway to winning!” Cocoa said with a hint of devilish glee at the revelation. “ Huh? Half way? What do you mean, I finished it all!” Sparks replied with shock and confusion. “ The Challenge was to finish the meal sparks, this was just the first course, don’t tell me you didn’t notice those Sundaes on the Kitchen counter?” Cocoa said as she tilted her head slightly to the direction where two mountainous and indulgent looking ice cream Sundaes were resting . “ You mean…those are for us and not our trainers?” Cocoa asked in horror. “ Oh no, as a guest Mellissa always makes sure she makes desert, after all its only a teeny little bit of ice cream, don’t tell me your gonna quit on me now?” Cocoa revealed to the stuffed looking Pikachu , knowing all along there wasn’t a hope in High water that Sparks was gonna win this little challenge of hers. Sparks gulped in slight dread, she was obviously toying with him, but he had to at least try.


Mellisa walked in form the other kitchen prep area room. “Oh my Sparks, you must have been hungry, you cleared your plate! Im glad I made this desert for you both, I thought it would go to waste! Here you go you two, bonne appetite!” Mellissa placed the Two Sundaes in front of the Pokemon along with two spoons and left back to Her meal with Terrence. “ Mmmm triple fudge, marshmallow and vanilla supreme! I love it when Mellisa makes these, dig in Sparks!” Cocoa beamed as she Picked up the spoon and started scooping large portions of the sundae into her Salivating maw. Sparks just looked on in amazement at Cocoa indulging in the ice cream, there was something about the way she enjoyed her food unashamedly that really appealed to his inner senses. He knew he couldn’t stare, above all it was rude and he had his own little challenge to attend too. Sparks slowly dragged himself on to his two back paws again, the heavy weight and pain in his now distended stomach making it harder for him to move his body. He shakily reached for the spoon and took one tiny scoop out of the Sundae. Placing the spoon in his mouth his taste buds sent a sensation to his brain that told him while delicious, the sundae was packed with more calories than he could handle. As he swallowed the first mouthful, his stomach made a deep gurgling noise, he really was at his limit food wise now. Only managing a few meagre mouthfuls more, Sparks collapsed forwards onto the floor in a daze of ice cream induced bewilderment. “ ohhh *Groan* Cocoa…I can’t do it, its too much!” Sparks groaned out . As he was saying this, Cocoa was just about finishing the last few spoonfuls of her sundae, she was obviously moving at a much difference pace to the struggling Pikachu beside her. “ *gulp* ahh delicious! It even had crumbled cookies in the bottom!” Cocoa enthuistiastically said as she placed down the empty sundae glass and threw in the spoon. She then turned her eyes to the yielding Pokemon sprawled on the shiny floor. “ hmm..so I guess that means you give in huh? I win again?” Cooa’s tone was that of playful mocking. If there was one thing she enjoyed doing it was winning, especially if it involved showing a cocky male Pokémon how they can overestimate themselves. She was unashamedly gonna enjoy this victory.

Sparks was realising what a jackass he was by trying to eat any of the ice cream at all, he should have just admitted defeat earlier but now he was feeling like he had bowling ball in his body and his head was spinning. Not only did he feel he’d made a fool of himself in front of The Raichu that had defeated him at the stadium so easily, he now feared he might even be sick in front of her. ( Damnit, I would have thought she’d of at least slowed down by that sundae, she ate it like it was a tiny cracker..i cant get on her level in Pokemon battling or food, im so pathetic..). “ You…you win Cocoa *groan*” Sparks meekly squeaked out, the pitiful sight of him not being able to make it to his paws was enough to Make Sparks give up any hope of trying to show he had any pride left. She’d totally beaten him, plain and simple. “ You need more training young apprentice! The Sundae is only big in your mind, here let me show you how a champion does it!” Cocoa said as she leaned one corpulent paw over to grab Spark’s sundae glass and lifted it up to herself. She titled the glass towards her open mouth and with her other paw clutching her spoon she she started shovelling in the entire sundae slowly into her maw and was guzzling it all down with gluttonous aplomb. Sparks watched in amazement as in just a few seconds of greedy slurps and gulps she had finished off the entire Sundae like it was a glass of water. “ *slurp* Ahh! I always love it when I get seconds!” Cocoa said triumphantly as she laid the now second empty sundae glass on the floor, wiped away the ice cream around her face and patted her expansive belly with both paws. Sparks watched on at this Raichus display of seemingly endless appetite with disbelief, he’d never seen a female Pokemon be so unashamedly gluttonous like that, so shameless, capable and free…Sparks couldn’t logically explain why, but he was feeling deeply aroused by the display. A small flurry of Dark orange sparks emitted from the infatuated Pikachu’s cheeks.

Cocoa noticed the Dark orange flickers and knew exactly what it meant. ( So he likes a girl that can eat eh? This is so perfect! ) Cocoa gleefully thought to herself as she decided it was time to have a little fun with Sparks. “


Cocoa dropped forward onto all four paws and crouched forward slightly so her face was positioned right next to Spark’s on his eye level. She then lowered her eyelids slightly and gave an intimidating smile like a predator that had trapped its prey and knew it couldn’t get away. Being in the state of physical helplessness he was in and having the huge Raichu of his affections staring him right in the face just made Spark’s mind jumble with conflicting thoughts and emotions. “ uhhh…Cocoa?” he meekly asked. “ It was cute of you to challenge me, but you know this Raichu plays to win and I usually get what I want…and right now I have you just where I WANT you!”” Cocoa smoothly explained to Sparks in a sultry and somewhat intimidating voice. Spark’s cheeks turned crimson red with a surge of blood and adrenaline.. ( What the hell is her game here? She looks like shes gonna eat me..) Sparks panicked thoughts brought to mind. Once again Spark’s stuffed stomach let out a gurgling groan and he clutched it as he felt a jolt of pain from it. “ Ughh, Cocoa I ate too much…I don’t think I can even move”. Sparks said as his voice tone sounded more and more like a plea for help. Cocoa snapped out whatever frame of mind she was in before and sat upwards., her voice now changing to a more delicate and compassionate tone “ Aww my poor Challenger..you look like a Big pillowy Yellow Jigglypuff..so cute!”. Cocoas making fun of Spark’s condition would normally enrage Pikachus male pride, but there was a new feeling overcoming him. She was clearly dominant and showing it but somehow Sparks didn’t oppose it, in fact he was strangely enjoying it to a degree. She was bigger,stronger and more capable than him, and he was comfortable with it now, to a certain degree he was even liking it despite the physical pain he was in.


“ Come on Sparks, lets rest this off on the couch.” Cocoa said as she scooped him up in her paws like a Groom carrying their bride over a threshold. Sparks being too full and dizzy to put up a resistance to her carrying him like this. As Cocoa strided towards the living room, Sparks could only look up towards her full and vibrant face and admire her beauty as he was nestled in her paws tightly like a helpless new-born. ( she sure is beautiful…) Sparks thought to himself as they approached the couch.
1553311112.title: He finishes it... But gets desert:(

choices: Sparks is back with Terrance!(Time Skip)
15533111121.content:
Cocoa carried the bloated, defeated Pikachu over to the comfy looking red couch and placed him gently onto the right cushion and with a massive *WHUMP* jumped on herself and sat down next to him in a sit up position. Sparks was still getting used to how it felt to have this huge female Raichu be so close to him without being in a battle situation as the ripples of her weight impacted on the Couch around him. Sparks sat up also and held his distended belly tightly as it continued to groan and churn. “ Ohh..Cocoa..im so sorry, I don’t know why I ate so much,I feel so stupid.” Sparks apologised to Cocoa. “ tee hee, I think its your stomach your apologising too really, it must feel like its been attacked by a burger typhoon!”. Cocoa replied with playfulness. “ Ohh *Gurgle* It hurts so much..”. Sparks continued to groan. Cocoa stroked Spark’s back and ears with one paw. “ You really are in pain aren’t you? There is something I could do to help if you want.”. Cocoa mentioned with a hint of Seductive provocation. “Huh?” asked Sparks. “ A special massage, it nearly always works but we would have to get…kinda close, would you be OK with that?” Said Cocoa sounding increasingly enticing. Sparks gulped in nervousness, of course he wanted to be close to her but he’d never done any more than hug other Pokémon, a massage sounded…dangerously close to an area he felt he was an unprepared explorer for right now, especially in his current physical state.

“ Uhhh…Sure” Sparks gave permission for her offer as he was nervous and was spluttering orange sparks again, but he could tell from the look in her eye and her stroking paw that she knew what she was doing. He felt he could trust her, plus something that could help take away this ever increasing feeling of pain in his stomach? What did he have to lose? “ Okay Sparks, lie down on your side, face turning away from me.” Cocoa told her new Massage client. “Okay..” Sparks obeyed and moved up the couch and onto his side like he was told. He was both excited and anxious about what would happen next. Cocoa flopped her huge body right next to him in a parallel position. Sparks could feel her warmth and size right next to him. “ Now relax your body, just let my paws do the work.” Cocoa said. She moved her sizeable big paws across Sparks chest and then placed them on his exposed belly and pulled Sparks entire body next to hers, squishing him between her own wide belly and soft breasts. The sharp shock to Sparks’ sensitive stomach caused a brief sting of pain . “ Arh!” yelped Sparks. “ It’ll only hurt for a second Sparks, just relax” Cocoa reassuringly said.

Cocoa started moving her paws up and down and then around and around rhythmically, The soothing effects of her massaging paws took effect almost immediately as Sparks Stomach churning noises dimmed as the indigestion and pain started to melt away. “ Ohh yeah…keep doing that Cocoa…it feels so good!” sparks said perkily as he enjoyed the soothing sensation of her touch. ( how can a big girl like this be so delicate with her touch? She’s just amazing!) Thought Sparks. After half a minute or so of massaging his Belly, Sparks stomach had completely settled and a warm feeling of bliss had come over him . Cocoa removed her paws from his mid-section and hugged his chest tightly, pulling him even together towards him in a tight embrace. “You enjoyed that Sparks?” asked Cocoa. “ You made the pain just. Fly away somewhere! Thank you so much Cocoa, but where did you learn these abilities?” asked Sparks. Cocoa hesitated a little as she knew the answer to the cuddled Pikachus question but it wasn’t something she wanted to go into right now. “ Oh..from another Pokemon, I’ll tell you about it sometime. How are you feeling?” . Cocoa replied. “Yawn…I’m. Starting to feel so tired, sorry Cocoa I don’t know what’s coming over me..” Said Sparks starting to sound drowsy. “ Oh don’t worry Sparks, that’s just the after effects of human food and the massage, you should just let yourself rest as the food digests.”. Cocoa explained. “ mmm kay” Sparks mumbled as he closed his eyes and settled in, Cocoas soft but plentiful body felt so snug and comforting around him. He had been totally squashed and encompassed by it before in the match when she sat on him sure but this was different. Her embrace made him feel warm, content and protected from anything in the outside world. Even the nasty memories of his past seemed as if they were being replaced by feelings of secure passion as he was snuggled up against her ample breasts and squishy soft belly.

“ *yawn*..Thank you Cocoa, Ive never met a Raichu like you before, I have So much I want to ask you”. Sparks drowsily said. “You’ll get the chance soon, I overheard Mellisa earlier, Shes gonna invite your trainer and you for a picnic on Thursday. I get the feeling while your in town , your trainer wont say no” Cocoa said with confidence. “ that’s….nice….zzzzz” Sparks mumbled quietly as he fell into a deep relaxing sleep, nestled in Cocoas paws and only really half listening. “ Heh lights out Sparks, sweet dreams”. Cocoa said sweetly as she gave Sparks a small peck of a kiss on the back of his head and started to join him in the land of nod. Both electric Pokémon now pleasantly making purr like Snores as they peacefully sleep off their meal.

Mellissa and Terrence who had been idly passing the night with their dinner and talking about many a Pokemon training and breeding subject walked in with glasses of wine planning on resting up themselves. “ Oh my.. Terrence I think we better go to the conservatory instead, I don’t have it in me to wake these two up.” Melissa said with warmth as she found the image of the two Pokemon curled up on the sofa precious beyond belief. “ Wow..I never thought I’d see Sparks with a Raichu like that, especially one that defeated him in battle so hard, he’s usually such a standoff hot head with Raichus, Cocoa must be something special to him.” Said Terrence. “ Well its good they can spend more time with each other then, come on lets leave these little love birds alone”. Melissa replied as they both walked off to leave the Two Pokémon alone.
15533111121.title: It feels good to let loose sometimes

choices: Terrance and Mellisa meet up again
Cocoa pays Sparks and Terrance a Visit
155331111211.content:
It was a bright and sunny day and Sparks and his fellow Pokemon that belonged to Terrence were all out exercising and training in the large garden area of the Pokémon league villa he was renting for the couple of weeks that the tournament was going on. Terrence may have been knocked out of the tournament but he always made sure his Pokémon were all let out of their poke balls for training once in a while. Becker, a rather spry and focused looking male Hitmonchan who was Sparks best friend, was punching a makeshift punching bag made out of an old flour sack on and off whilst Sparks was telling him all about his recent meetings with Cocoa.

“ And you should see her trainers house, its huge and there’s even a Pokémon recreation center building out in the grounds plus a Taraus farm…oh and she said she’d show me more when im next there and she gets human food for every meal and she’s always let out of pokeball and.” Sparks was quickly gabbling excitedly about all his experiences when Becker cut him off. “ Whoa! Slow down Sparks, I can’t believe your talking this much about a Pokémon that beat you, a Raichu at that! Sparks reacted a little at realising how Cocoa had changed his world view on Raichus. “ Well…She’s totally different from all the rest ive known..She’s special in a lot of other ways too.” Sparks explained. “ Hmmm..you’ve beaten up other pokemon for talking about opponents that beat you, and she kind of beat you badly…what the hell happened between then and now to make you change like this?” Said Becker.

At that moment Sharella the female Charmander (also one of Terrence’s Pokemon) overheard the conversation and approached to add her contribution. “ Oh I know what happened, at the Pokemon center when Cocoa and her trainer came to visit, that Raichu went in with a face of Shame but came out looking extremely pleased and happy about something…so what did you do Sparks? Something spicy I bet !” Sharella taunted. “ hey! She and her trainer came to apologise! That’s all! How many Pokemon that put you in the center did that for you eh?” definitely replied Sparks. “ Oh and how did she apologise?” questioned Sharella. “ Well she kissed my…hey! Why do I have to tell you any of this? Get back to your training if your just here to annoy me!” Angrily snapped Sparks. “heh heh, okay, seems I hit a sore spot! Oh and glad to hear you enjoyed all that human food at her Trainers place, maybe if I get sat on by a raichu I can get me a lobster dinner at their trainers place!” Mockingly Joked Sharella as she walked away back to her exercises.

“Hmmph! They think its all a joke…” Stated Sparks looking flustered at being coerced into revealing more than he was comfortable talking about. “ Hmm..Im surprised at your tastes Sparks, I never suspected you had an eye for the larger Pokémon girls.” Said Becker. “ Hey! Who said I had tastes for anything! “ Sparks retorted starting to blush a little. “ Oh come on, its obvious you like her I’ve known you far too long to not know when a female Pokémon has grabbed your hormones…so have you mated with her?” Becker said Bluntly. “What!?” Sparks was completely taken aback by this.” I mean..where does that even come into it?” replied Sparks. “ “Well..you DO like her right?” said Becker “ Well…yeah but in terms of that…I mean what does it matter? I’m just glad I’ve met a Raichu like her and we could be friends for what short time we can be together. I mean why would she ever be interested in a Tiny Pikachu like me anyway? “ retorted Sparks. “ Well…lets put it this way, your saying a Raichu of her er…size would usually never look twice at a Pikachu right?” asked Becker. “ Well…no” replied Sparks “ but would a Pikachu of your size usually be interested in a Raichu of her size?” proposed Becker. “ Well…no”. Answered Sparks. “ Well there you go, life is never as black and white like that! Shouldn’t you at least let her know how you feel about her tomorrow when you meet? What have you got to lose?” Said Becker.


Sparks looked sheepishly at the ground “ I guess nothing…in any case were only here for another week or so..its not like it would mean much if we became anything much more than friends..” Said Sparks with a dejected look on his face. “ Sparks, you don’t need to look at life like an endless highway with just one final destination, it can branch out onto any different road you like, a few days ago I was convinced you were happy to remain in the backseat of that car on the highway but now..maybe you should start to take control of the wheel?” The Calm Hitmonchan said in a sermon like manner. “ Hmm..that's what I like you as a friend Becker, I can count on you to talk like an adult, not the potty minded bozos back there, but still what I really wanna do is properly talk to her, find out more about her. Why is she so different from all the other Raichus I’ve met? I really know nothing much about her.” Replied Sparks. “Well whatever happens just be yourself and relax, good luck Sparks.” Said Becker. “ Thanks man “ Said Sparks as he went back to running around in training for quick attacks, as he was zig zagging across the lush green grass his thoughts were locked on what he was going to say to Cocoa at the Picnic. “ Hmm..an adult..i need to act like one myself, Im not a naïve Pichu with no brain of his own, I just need to talk to her seriously.”
155331111211.title: A Brief Interlude

1553311112111.content:
Terrence had hired a car and driven him and Sparks up to a beautiful lakeside beauty spot for a picnic that he and Mellissa had invited them to, they were getting along great as trainers and had both noticed how well Sparks and Cocoa were getting along so Terrence made sure to take Sparks along especially. Sparks had been out of his poke ball all morning and had butterflies in his stomach as he waited curled up in the trunk of the car. (Man I can’t help but feel excited every time I get to see Cocoa again.) Sparks happily thought to himself. Terrence reached their destination and pulled up at a small parking spot. “Okay Sparks, were here! Let’s get out now”. Terrence yelled out. As he opened up the trunk, Sparks jumped out and onto the soft lush grass and noticed how the sun was beaming out brightly and the lake in the distance seemed to sparkle on its rays, absolutely divine weather.


As they both walked to the picnic area, they could see on the Benches Mellissa and Cocoa were already there and were setting up picnic foods and disposable glasses, plates, etc. Sparks couldn’t control himself from running ahead as soon as he saw Cocoa in the distance helping unpack various nick nacks from the baskets. Despite his cool logical side telling him to be mature and reserved about seeing Cocoa, Sparks couldn’t help but act on impulse like a kid in a candy store and rush towards his desire. He stopped in front of the massive Raichu and started to pant to catch his breath. “ Wow, slow down tiger, I may have a big appetite but I’d not dream of starting without you!” Cocoa joked with a warm smile. “ Oh no..*huff* I was just er..really happy to see you!” Said Sparks with a goofy smile as he caught his breathe. Sparks inner critic in his mind was telling him he sounded dumb but he remembered Beckers words about being himself. ( Well maybe I sound dorky and goofy but who cares? Cocoa seems to be comfortable with it, I like being goofy!) Sparks reassured himself internally. “ Hehe, you sure are a cute one Sparks, Come on, help me unpack all this stuff!”. Cocoa responded with light banter. (Wow.. Trainers don’t usually let their Pokémon touch their carefully packed things like that, she sure is a different kind of Pokémon.). Sparks thought to himself.


As the Two Pokémon helped Mellissa unpack all the picnic items and food, Terrence caught up with Sparks and greeted Mellissa. “ Hey there Mellisa, Cocoa! Great to see you again, Sparks did Mellissa tell you, you could touch those things?”. Said Terrence to Sparks in a nagging tone. “ Oh no its fine, He’s just helping Cocoa unpack things for me, Cocoa asked him to help. I have a special understanding with Cocoa, its almost like I can understand her Pokémon language. Terrence was a little sceptical of this claim but he was surprised to see how Sparks and Cocoa were unpacking the items in unison in a very efficient human like manner. “ Well I have to admit ive never seen Sparks this focused on a task like that, following a Raichus lead like that, Cocoa sure has had an effect on him!” Terrence proclaimed with an uplifting smile. “Come on, lets have some snacks before we enjoy the weather and maybe play ultimate Frisbee by the lake aye? I brought some Poke Toys for the Chu’s. said Mellissa as she unwrapped a lot of sandwiches.

As Terrence dug into the Sprawling set of snacks, Melissa unwrapped two large plastic trays full of what seemed to be some kind of colourful bread rolls. “Here ya go guys, enjoy!” She said as she laid them on the ground for the two Chu’s to enjoy. “ They look great for Pokémon food, what are they?” Asked Terrence. “ Special home-made Poffins, well..i call them that anyway, there more like Japanese filled bread rolls but I think the idea of them being poffins is kind of cute, I make them in sweet and savoury varieties, Cocoa knows which ones are which by their colour by now.”. Explained Mellissa. Cocoa and Sparks sat down and started to munch away at the Poffins, Sparks was excited to learn of all the different fillings and colours of them, there were egg and bacon, cream cheese, onion chutney, etc. ( and Mellissa’s Pokémon at the ranch get this kind of food all the time? No wonder Cocoa maintains such a size..). Sparks thought to himself after finishing just one he was already starting to feel full. “Hey Sparks, since there’s 12 poffins in each tray how about we have a little game, if we ea- “ Cocoa started to say in a playful voice but Sparks immediately cut her off. “ NO! *ahem* I mean…I think i learned my lesson from last time, I know my own limits when it comes to Mellissa’s food!” Sparks rejected her offer with a knowing smile, the fresh memories of his loss to the hamburger and Sundae still fresh in his mind. “You wimp.” Cocoa teased while sticking out her tongue slightly. “ Yup, when it comes to food, that’s me”. Sparks replied in a playful tone. ( Wow, did I really just admit I was a wimp at something. Even as a joke I can’t believe how This Raichu has changed me). Sparks thought to himself as he nibbled on a delicious curry flavoured Poffin.

After the Snack plates were finished (Sparks ate four poffins while cocoa cleaned out all 12 and still looked like she could handle a lot more). Mellissa and Terrence started to make off to a nearby clearing to play Frisbee with Melissa. “ Now Cocoa, I packed some Poketoys in that basket there, why don’t you show Sparks around the lake and have fun?” Asked Melissa. “ Raichu!” replied Cocoa with energy. “Come on Sparks, let’s go for a walk first, I wanna show you the best view of the lake”. Said Cocoa. “ Sounds great, I’d love to talk to you for a while too, I cant think of better weather for it.” Replied Sparks as he stood up and headed out as Cocoa carried the basket in her paws. As they walked slowly across the carpet like soft lush grass, Sparks looked up at Cocoa and slightly nervously started to ask about questions he was dying to know the answers too. “ Cocoa. Please don’t feel you have to answer this but. Why are you so much larger than other Raichus? I mean height wise you’re almost as tall as some humans…” Asked Sparks nervously. Cocoa looked back and smiled, she knew sooner or later this question would come up. “ Its Ok Sparks, Im not too sure myself why I’ve always been so much bigger than other Raichus, Melissa and my past trainer took to me to some Pokémon specialist doctors and I overheard them say it was a rare condition called Pokémon Gigantism Something about exposure to a rare evolutionary stone when I was a young Pichu or something. I can’t remember back that far…and I don’t really care either. There’s nothing that can be done about my size and in the past I always hated my condition, but I’ve come to accept who I am and love my own body the way it is. After all , I’d never be able to do so well in Pokémon battling without my size advantage.” Cocoa explained. “ Well your right there, I’ve never faced such an opponent like you in battle Cocoa, you fight with amazing strength and intelligence, any Pokémon would be a fool not to respect you in the field, but. Did the Doctors explain anything more?”. Asked Sparks. “Nothing…they seemed pretty blank on what was going on with my condition, apart from my body structure and Increased appetite. There was nothing unhealthy found about me out of the ordinary and that was that. So you may aswelll just say I’m a magic Raichu that thinks big and is big..heh “. Cocoa said with a wink The two Pokémon come to the edge of the lakes water and a beautiful panoramic view of the clear crystal lake unfolded before them. The Clear water was sparkling in the suns rays, interrupted only by the odd Magikarp leaping in and out of the water gracefully. “ Ahh its so beautiful” Said Sparks as his eyes gleamed in admiration. “ It sure is..Melissa takes us Pokémon here a lot..I have so many good memories of this place” Said Cocoa as she seemed to be recollecting good experiences.
